title: Allocation of a block of land situated in the Centre of the Imaduwa Town to the Ceylon Electricity Board
decision_details: - Several plots of land belonging to the Government and the private sector have been acquired by the Urban Development Authority for the Imaduwa Town Centre Project and the proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development, to vest a plot of land in extent of 01 rood and 03.20 perches out of those, with the Ceylon Electricity Board, to establish the proposed electrical sub‑station in the Imaduwa Town,  subject to the payment of the Government valuation, was approved by the Cabinet.
